trans-unit.source: Set to the Android ABI (architecture). If not specified, this variable will default to armeabi. The CMAKE_ANDROID_ARCH variable will be computed from CMAKE_ANDROID_ARCH_ABI automatically. Also see the CMAKE_ANDROID_ARM_MODE and CMAKE_ANDROID_ARM_NEON variables.
trans-unit.target: 设置为Android ABI（架构）。如果未指定，此变量将默认为 armeabi 。该 CMAKE_ANDROID_ARCH 变量将从计算 CMAKE_ANDROID_ARCH_ABI 自动。另请参阅 CMAKE_ANDROID_ARM_MODE 和 CMAKE_ANDROID_ARM_NEON 变量。

trans-unit.source: Set to the Android API level. If not specified, the value is determined as follows:
trans-unit.target: 设置为Android API级别。如果没有指定,则按以下方式确定值。

trans-unit.source: Set to the Swift language version number. If not set, the oldest legacy version known to be available in the host Xcode version is assumed:
trans-unit.target: 设置为Swift语言版本号。如果没有设置,则假定主机Xcode版本中已知的最古老的遗留版本。

trans-unit.source: Set to the absolute path to the Android NDK root directory. A ${CMAKE_ANDROID_NDK}/platforms directory must exist. If not specified, a default for this variable will be chosen as specified above.
trans-unit.target: 设置为Android NDK根目录的绝对路径。一个 ${CMAKE_ANDROID_NDK}/platforms 目录必须存在。如果未指定，则将如上所述选择此变量的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Set to the absolute path to the standalone toolchain root directory. A ${CMAKE_ANDROID_STANDALONE_TOOLCHAIN}/sysroot directory must exist. If not specified, a default for this variable will be chosen as specified above.
trans-unit.target: 设置为独立工具链根目录的绝对路径。一个 ${CMAKE_ANDROID_STANDALONE_TOOLCHAIN}/sysroot 目录必须存在。如果未指定，则将按指定选择此变量的默认值如上所述。

trans-unit.source: Set to the version of the NDK toolchain to be selected as the compiler. If not specified, the default will be the latest available GCC toolchain.
trans-unit.target: 设置为要被选为编译器的NDK工具链版本。如果没有指定,默认为最新的GCC工具链。

trans-unit.source: Set to true if ODBC library found, otherwise false or undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到ODBC库则设置为true,否则为false或未定义。

trans-unit.source: Set to true to disable searching for the FLTK Forms library
trans-unit.target: 设置为 "true",禁止搜索FLTK窗体库。

trans-unit.source: Set to true to disable searching for the FLTK GL library
trans-unit.target: 设置为 "true",禁止搜索FLTK GL库。

trans-unit.source: Set to true to disable searching for the FLTK Images library
trans-unit.target: 设置为 "true",禁止搜索FLTK图像库。

trans-unit.source: Set to true to not look for the FLUID binary
trans-unit.target: 设置为true,不查找FLUID二进制。

trans-unit.source: Set to true to tell Makefile Generators not to remove the outputs of custom commands for this directory during the make clean operation. This is ignored on other generators because it is not possible to implement.
trans-unit.target: 设置为true以告诉Makefile生成器在 make clean 期间不要删除此目录的自定义命令的输出操作。这在其他生成器上将被忽略，因为无法实现。

trans-unit.source: Set to true when using the Visual Studio 2005 compiler from Microsoft.
trans-unit.target: 当使用微软的Visual Studio 2005编译器时,设置为true。

trans-unit.source: Set username and password for operation.
trans-unit.target: 设置用户名和密码进行操作。

trans-unit.source: Sets a property for the tests. If the test is not found, CMake will report an error. Generator expressions will be expanded the same as supported by the test’s add_test() call.
trans-unit.target: 设置测试的属性。如果未找到测试，CMake将报告错误。 Generator expressions 将与测试的 add_test() 支持的扩展相同调用。

trans-unit.source: Sets an Environment Variable to the given value. Subsequent calls of $ENV{<variable>} will return this new value.
trans-unit.target: 将 Environment Variable 设置为给定值。随后的 $ENV{<variable>} 调用将返回此新值。

trans-unit.source: Sets one property on zero or more objects of a scope.
trans-unit.target: 在作用域的零个或多个对象上设置一个属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets properties associated with source files using a key/value paired list.
trans-unit.target: 使用键/值配对列表设置与源文件相关的属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets properties of the current directory and its subdirectories in key-value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 设置当前目录及其子目录的键值对的属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets properties on targets. The syntax for the command is to list all the targets you want to change, and then provide the values you want to set next. You can use any prop value pair you want and extract it later with the get_property() or get_target_property() command.
trans-unit.target: 在目标上设置属性。该命令的语法是列出要更改的所有目标，然后提供下一步要设置的值。您可以使用任何所需的prop值对，并稍后使用 get_property() 或 get_target_property() 命令将其提取。

trans-unit.source: Sets source file properties for use of Windows Forms. Use this, if your CSharp target uses Windows Forms:
trans-unit.target: 设置使用Windows Forms的源文件属性。如果你的CSharp目标使用Windows窗体,请使用这个。

trans-unit.source: Sets source file properties for use of Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) and XAML. Use this, if your CSharp target uses WPF/XAML:
trans-unit.target: 设置用于Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF)和XAML的源文件属性。如果你的CSharp目标使用WPF/XAML,请使用这个。

trans-unit.source: Sets source file properties of .Designer.cs files depending on sibling filenames. Use this, if your CSharp target does not use Windows Forms (for Windows Forms use csharp_set_designer_cs_properties() instead):
trans-unit.target: 根据同级文件名设置 .Designer.cs 文件的源文件属性。使用这个，如果你的目标CSHARP并没有使用Windows窗体（Windows窗体使用 csharp_set_designer_cs_properties() 代替）：

trans-unit.source: Sets the “RootNamespace” attribute for a generated Visual Studio project. The attribute will be generated only if this is set.
trans-unit.target: 为生成的Visual Studio项目设置“ RootNamespace”属性。只有设置了此属性，才会生成该属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the “keyword” attribute for a generated Visual Studio project. Defaults to “Win32Proj”. You may wish to override this value with “ManagedCProj”, for example, in a Visual Studio managed C++ unit test project.
trans-unit.target: 为生成的Visual Studio项目设置“关键字”属性。默认为“ Win32Proj”。例如，在Visual Studio托管的C ++单元测试项目中，您可能希望使用“ ManagedCProj”覆盖此值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <CopyToOutputDirectory> tag for a source file in a Visual Studio project file. Valid values are Never, Always and PreserveNewest.
trans-unit.target: 为Visual Studio项目文件中的源文件设置 <CopyToOutputDirectory> 标记。有效值为 Never ， Always 和 PreserveNewest 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the ConfigurationType attribute for a generated Visual Studio project. If this property is set, it overrides the default setting that is based on the target type (e.g. StaticLibrary, Application, …).
trans-unit.target: 设置生成的Visual Studio项目的 ConfigurationType 属性。如果设置了此属性，它将覆盖基于目标类型的默认设置（例如， StaticLibrary ， Application ，…）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the ConfigurationType attribute for a generated Visual Studio project. The property value may use generator expressions. If this property is set, it overrides the default setting that is based on the target type (e.g. StaticLibrary, Application, …).
trans-unit.target: 设置生成的Visual Studio项目的 ConfigurationType 属性。该属性值可以使用 generator expressions 。如果设置了此属性，它将覆盖基于目标类型的默认设置（例如， StaticLibrary ， Application ，…）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Copy Local property for all .NET hint references in the target
trans-unit.target: 为目标中的所有.NET提示引用设置“ 复制本地”属性

trans-unit.source: Sets the advanced/non-advanced state of the named cached variables.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定缓存变量的高级/非高级状态。

trans-unit.source: Sets the arguments specific to the CPack IFW generator.
trans-unit.target: 设置CPack IFW生成器的特定参数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the dashboard action to perform.
trans-unit.target: 设置要执行的仪表盘操作。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default for whether toolchain-defined rpaths should be removed during installation.
trans-unit.target: 设置在安装过程中是否要删除工具链定义的rpath的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the directory where the header files will be generated. Same behavior as option -d of javah tool. If not specified, CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR is used as the output directory.
trans-unit.target: 设置将在其中生成头文件的目录。与javah工具的 -d 选项相同。如果未指定，则 CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR 用作输出目录。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given <variable> in the current function or directory scope.
trans-unit.target: 在当前函数或目录范围内设置给定的 <variable> 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given <variable> to a command-line string of the form:
trans-unit.target: 将给定的 <variable> 设置为以下形式的命令行字符串：

trans-unit.source: Sets the given cache <variable> (cache entry). Since cache entries are meant to provide user-settable values this does not overwrite existing cache entries by default. Use the FORCE option to overwrite existing entries.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定的缓存 <variable> （缓存条目）。由于高速缓存条目旨在提供用户可设置的值，因此默认情况下不会覆盖现有的高速缓存条目。使用 FORCE 选项覆盖现有条目。

trans-unit.source: Sets the local debugger command for Visual Studio C++ targets. The property value may use generator expressions. This is defined in <LocalDebuggerCommand> in the Visual Studio project file.
trans-unit.target: 为Visual Studio C ++目标设置本地调试器命令。该属性值可以使用 generator expressions 。这是在Visual Studio项目文件的 <LocalDebuggerCommand> 中定义的。

trans-unit.source: Sets the local debugger command line arguments for Visual Studio C++ targets. The property value may use generator expressions. This is defined in <LocalDebuggerCommandArguments> in the Visual Studio project file.
trans-unit.target: 为Visual Studio C ++目标设置本地调试器命令行参数。该属性值可以使用 generator expressions 。这是在Visual Studio项目文件的 <LocalDebuggerCommandArguments> 中定义的。

trans-unit.source: Sets the local debugger environment for Visual Studio C++ targets. The property value may use generator expressions. This is defined in <LocalDebuggerEnvironment> in the Visual Studio project file.
trans-unit.target: 为Visual Studio C ++目标设置本地调试器环境。该属性值可以使用 generator expressions 。这是在Visual Studio项目文件的 <LocalDebuggerEnvironment> 中定义的。

trans-unit.source: Sets the local debugger working directory for Visual Studio C++ targets. The property value may use generator expressions. This is defined in <LocalDebuggerWorkingDirectory> in the Visual Studio project file.
trans-unit.target: 设置Visual Studio C ++目标的本地调试器工作目录。该属性值可以使用 generator expressions 。这是在Visual Studio项目文件的 <LocalDebuggerWorkingDirectory> 中定义的。

trans-unit.source: Sets the minimum required version of cmake for a project. Also updates the policy settings as explained below.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个项目所需的 cmake 的最小版本。同时更新策略设置,如下所述。

trans-unit.source: Sets the model for a dashboard.
trans-unit.target: 设置仪表盘的模型。

trans-unit.source: Sets the name of the project, and stores it in the variable PROJECT_NAME. When called from the top-level CMakeLists.txt also stores the project name in the variable CMAKE_PROJECT_NAME.
trans-unit.target: 设置项目的名称，并将其存储在变量 PROJECT_NAME 中。从顶层 CMakeLists.txt 调用时，还将项目名称存储在变量 CMAKE_PROJECT_NAME 中。

trans-unit.source: Sets the regular expressions used in dependency checking. Only files matching regex_match will be traced as dependencies. Only files matching regex_complain will generate warnings if they cannot be found (standard header paths are not searched). The defaults are:
trans-unit.target: 设置在依赖项检查中使用的正则表达式。仅将匹配 regex_match 的文件作为依赖项进行跟踪。如果找不到与 regex_complain 匹配的文件，则只会生成警告（不搜索标准头路径）。默认值为：

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified variable to a string representing the platform and compiler settings. These values are now available through the CMAKE_SYSTEM and CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER variables.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的变量设置为代表平台和编译器设置的字符串。这些值现在可通过 CMAKE_SYSTEM 和 CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER 变量获得。

trans-unit.source: Sets the target XML documentation file output.
trans-unit.target: 设置目标 XML 文档文件的输出。

trans-unit.source: Sets the user props file to be included in the visual studio C++ project file. The standard path is $(UserRootDir)\\Microsoft.Cpp.$(Platform).user.props, which is in most cases the same as %LOCALAPPDATA%\\Microsoft\\MSBuild\\v4.0\\Microsoft.Cpp.Win32.user.props or %LOCALAPPDATA%\\Microsoft\\MSBuild\\v4.0\\Microsoft.Cpp.x64.user.props.
trans-unit.target: 设置要包含在Visual Studio C ++项目文件中的用户props文件。标准路径是 $(UserRootDir)\\Microsoft.Cpp.$(Platform).user.props ，在大多数情况下，它与 %LOCALAPPDATA%\\Microsoft\\MSBuild\\v4.0\\Microsoft.Cpp.Win32.user.props 或 %LOCALAPPDATA%\\Microsoft\\MSBuild\\v4.0\\Microsoft.Cpp.x64.user.props 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the variable named ${var} to the number of physical cores available on the machine if the information can be determined. Otherwise it is set to 0. Currently this functionality is implemented for AIX, cygwin, FreeBSD, HPUX, Linux, macOS, QNX, Sun and Windows.
trans-unit.target: 将名为 ${var}的变量设置为机器上可用的物理核心数,如果能够确定该信息,则将其设置为 0。目前这个功能已经在AIX、cygwin、FreeBSD、HPUX、Linux、macOS、QNX、Sun和Windows中实现。

trans-unit.source: Sets the verbosity of AUTOMOC, AUTOUIC and AUTORCC. A positive integer value or a true boolean value lets the AUTO* generators output additional processing information.
trans-unit.target: 设置 AUTOMOC ， AUTOUIC 和 AUTORCC 的详细程度。正整数值或真布尔值可使 AUTO* 生成器输出其他处理信息。

trans-unit.source: Sets up an include guard for the current CMake file (see the CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_FILE variable documentation).
trans-unit.target: 为当前CMake文件设置一个包含保护（请参阅 CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_FILE 变量文档）。

trans-unit.source: Setting CMAKE_AUTOGEN_VERBOSE has the same effect as setting the VERBOSE environment variable during generation (e.g. by calling make VERBOSE=1). The extra verbosity is limited to the AUTO* generators though.
trans-unit.target: 设置 CMAKE_AUTOGEN_VERBOSE 与在生成过程中设置 VERBOSE 环境变量具有相同的效果（例如，通过调用 make VERBOSE=1 ）。不过，额外的详细信息仅限于 AUTO* 生成器。

trans-unit.source: Setting CMAKE_DOTNET_TARGET_FRAMEWORK may be necessary when working with C# and newer .NET framework versions to avoid referencing errors with the ALL_BUILD CMake target.
trans-unit.target: 使用 C# 和较新的.NET Framework版本时，可能需要设置 CMAKE_DOTNET_TARGET_FRAMEWORK ,以避免使用 ALL_BUILD CMake目标引用错误。

trans-unit.source: Setting CMAKE_DOTNET_TARGET_FRAMEWORK_VERSION may be necessary when working with C# and newer .NET framework versions to avoid referencing errors with the ALL_BUILD CMake target.
trans-unit.target: 使用 C# 和较新的.NET Framework版本时，可能需要设置 CMAKE_DOTNET_TARGET_FRAMEWORK_VERSION ,以避免使用 ALL_BUILD CMake目标引用错误。

trans-unit.target: 设置构建变量

trans-unit.target: 明确设置政策

trans-unit.source: Setting Policies by CMake Version
trans-unit.target: 按CMake版本设置策略

trans-unit.source: Setting a property like this generates an entry of the following form in the solution file:
trans-unit.target: 设置这样的属性会在解决方案文件中生成一个如下形式的条目。

trans-unit.source: Setting the default version in the preferences of the Xcode IDE.
trans-unit.target: 在Xcode IDE的首选项中设置默认版本。

trans-unit.source: Setting the default version via the xcode-select command line tool.
trans-unit.target: 通过 xcode-select 命令行工具设置默认版本。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to true ensures the source file will be skipped by unity builds when its associated target has its UNITY_BUILD property set to true. The source file will instead be compiled on its own in the same way as it would with unity builds disabled.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为true可确保当其关联目标的 UNITY_BUILD 属性设置为true时，源文件将被统一构建跳过。相反，源文件将以与禁用unity builds相同的方式自行编译。

trans-unit.source: Setting this to 0 prevents ctest(1) from being run again when it reaches the end of a script run by calling ctest -S.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为0可以防止 ctest(1) 在到达通过调用 ctest -S 运行的脚本末尾时再次运行。

trans-unit.source: Setting this variable to true enables showing a context with each line logged by the message() command (see CMAKE_MESSAGE_CONTEXT for how the context itself is specified).
trans-unit.target: 将此变量设置为true可以显示由 message() 命令记录的每一行的上下文（有关如何指定上下文本身，请参阅 CMAKE_MESSAGE_CONTEXT ）。

trans-unit.source: Setting variables on the command line
trans-unit.target: 在命令行上设置变量

trans-unit.source: Setting variables with cmake-gui
trans-unit.target: 使用 cmake-gui 设置变量

trans-unit.source: Several variables relate to the language components of a toolchain which are enabled. CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER is the full path to the compiler used for <LANG>. CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID is the identifier used by CMake for the compiler and CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_VERSION is the version of the compiler.
trans-unit.target: 有几个变量与启用的工具链的语言组件相关。 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER 是用于 <LANG> 的编译器的完整路径。 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID 是CMake用于编译器的标识符，而 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_VERSION 是编译器的版本。

trans-unit.source: Shared libraries may be linked to other shared libraries as part of their implementation. On some platforms the linker searches for the dependent libraries of shared libraries they are including in the link. Set this property to the list of dependent shared libraries of an imported library. The list should be disjoint from the list of interface libraries in the INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES property. On platforms requiring dependent shared libraries to be found at link time CMake uses this list to add appropriate files or paths to the link command line. Ignored for non-imported targets.
trans-unit.target: 共享库可以链接到其他共享库，作为其实现的一部分。在某些平台上，链接器搜索它们包括在链接中的共享库的从属库。将此属性设置为导入库的依赖共享库的列表。该列表应与 INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES 属性中的接口库列表不相交。在要求在链接时找到依赖的共享库的平台上，CMake使用此列表向链接命令行添加适当的文件或路径。忽略未导入的目标。

trans-unit.source: Shared library targets marked with the FRAMEWORK property generate frameworks on macOS, iOS and normal shared libraries on other platforms. This property may be set to a list of header files to be placed in the Headers directory inside the framework folder. On non-Apple platforms these headers may be installed using the PUBLIC_HEADER option to the install(TARGETS) command.
trans-unit.target: 标有 FRAMEWORK 属性的共享库目标在macOS，iOS上生成框架，并在其他平台上生成普通共享库。可以将此属性设置为要放在框架文件夹内的 Headers 目录中的头文件列表。在非Apple平台上，可以使用 install(TARGETS) 命令的 PUBLIC_HEADER 选项安装这些标头。

trans-unit.source: Shared library targets marked with the FRAMEWORK property generate frameworks on macOS, iOS and normal shared libraries on other platforms. This property may be set to a list of header files to be placed in the PrivateHeaders directory inside the framework folder. On non-Apple platforms these headers may be installed using the PRIVATE_HEADER option to the install(TARGETS) command.
trans-unit.target: 标有 FRAMEWORK 属性的共享库目标在macOS，iOS上生成框架，并在其他平台上生成普通共享库。可以将此属性设置为要放在框架文件夹内的PrivateHeaders目录中的头文件列表。在非Apple平台上，可以使用 install(TARGETS) 命令的 PRIVATE_HEADER 选项安装这些标头。

trans-unit.source: Shared stateless query files allow clients to share requests for major versions of the Object Kinds and get all requested versions recognized by the CMake that runs.
trans-unit.target: 共享的无状态查询文件允许客户端共享对主要类型的对象种类的请求，并获取运行的CMake识别的所有请求版本。

trans-unit.source: Short description of the project (only a few words). If the CMAKE_PROJECT_DESCRIPTION variable is set, it is used as the default value, otherwise the default will be a string generated by CMake based on CMAKE_PROJECT_NAME.
trans-unit.target: 项目的简短描述（仅几个字）。如果设置了 CMAKE_PROJECT_DESCRIPTION 变量，则将其用作默认值，否则默认值为CMake基于 CMAKE_PROJECT_NAME 生成的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Short project description given to the project command.
trans-unit.target: 给予项目命令的简短项目描述。

trans-unit.source: Should be set by config-files in the case that it has set Xxx_FOUND to FALSE. The contained message will be printed by the find_package() command and by find_package_handle_standard_args() to inform the user about the problem.
trans-unit.target: 如果已将 Xxx_FOUND 设置为FALSE，则应由配置文件设置。包含的消息将通过 find_package() 命令和 find_package_handle_standard_args() 打印，以通知用户有关问题。

trans-unit.source: Should rpaths be used for the build tree.
trans-unit.target: 是否应该将rpaths用于构建树。

trans-unit.source: Should the command be unable to obtain a timestamp the output variable will be set to the empty string “”.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令无法获得时间戳，则输出变量将设置为空字符串“”。

trans-unit.source: Should the target be processed with auto-moc (for Qt projects).
trans-unit.target: 目标是否应该用auto-moc处理(对于Qt项目)。

trans-unit.source: Should the target be processed with auto-rcc (for Qt projects).
trans-unit.target: 目标是否应该用auto-rcc处理(对于Qt项目)。

trans-unit.source: Should the target be processed with auto-uic (for Qt projects).
trans-unit.target: 目标是否应该用auto-uic处理(对于Qt项目)。

trans-unit.source: Show as JSON Object Model
trans-unit.target: 显示为JSON对象模型

trans-unit.source: Show debug messages.
trans-unit.target: 显示调试信息。

trans-unit.source: Show program name/version banner and exit.
trans-unit.target: 显示程序名称/版本横幅并退出。

trans-unit.source: Signatures of this command that specify a <value>... placeholder expect zero or more arguments. Multiple arguments will be joined as a semicolon-separated list to form the actual variable value to be set. Zero arguments will cause normal variables to be unset. See the unset() command to unset variables explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <value>... 占位符的此命令的签名期望零个或多个参数。多个参数将以分号分隔的列表形式连接，以形成要设置的实际变量值。零参数将导致未设置普通变量。请参阅 unset() 命令以显式取消设置变量。

trans-unit.source: Similar to $env{<variable-name>}, except that the value only comes from the parent environment, and never from the environment field. This allows you to prepend or append values to existing environment variables. For example, setting PATH to /path/to/ninja/bin:$penv{PATH} will prepend /path/to/ninja/bin to the PATH environment variable. This is needed because $env{<variable-name>} does not allow circular references.
trans-unit.target: 与 $env{<variable-name>} 相似，除了该值仅来自父环境，而不来自 environment 字段。这使您可以在现有环境变量之前或之后附加值。例如，将 PATH 设置为 /path/to/ninja/bin:$penv{PATH} 将 /path/to/ninja/bin 放在 PATH 环境变量之前。这是必需的，因为 $env{<variable-name>} 不允许循环引用。

trans-unit.source: Similar to NAMELINK_ONLY, but it has the opposite effect: it causes the installation of library files other than the namelink when a library target is installed. When neither NAMELINK_ONLY or NAMELINK_SKIP are given, both portions are installed. On platforms where versioned shared libraries do not have symlinks or when a library is not versioned, NAMELINK_SKIP installs the library. It is an error to use this parameter outside of a LIBRARY block.
trans-unit.target: 与 NAMELINK_ONLY 相似，但效果相反：安装库目标时，它会导致安装除名称链接之外的库文件。如果既未提供 NAMELINK_ONLY 也 NAMELINK_SKIP 提供NAMELINK_SKIP，则两个部分均已安装。在版本共享库没有符号链接或没有版本库的平台上， NAMELINK_SKIP 将安装该库。在 LIBRARY 块之外使用此参数是错误的。

trans-unit.source: Similar to PUBLIC_HEADER and PRIVATE_HEADER, but for RESOURCE files. See RESOURCE for details.
trans-unit.target: 与 PUBLIC_HEADER 和 PRIVATE_HEADER 类似，但用于 RESOURCE 文件。有关详细信息，请参见 RESOURCE 。

trans-unit.source: Similar to PUBLIC_HEADER, but for PRIVATE_HEADER files. See PRIVATE_HEADER for details.
trans-unit.target: 与 PUBLIC_HEADER 类似，但用于 PRIVATE_HEADER 文件。有关详细信息，请参见 PRIVATE_HEADER 。

trans-unit.source: Similar to the target property PREFIX, but used for import libraries (typically corresponding to a DLL) instead of regular libraries. A target property that can be set to override the prefix (such as lib) on an import library name.
trans-unit.target: 与目标属性 PREFIX 相似，但是用于导入库（通常对应于 DLL ）而不是常规库。可以设置为覆盖导入库名称上的前缀（例如 lib ）的目标属性。

trans-unit.source: Similar to the target property SUFFIX, but used for import libraries (typically corresponding to a DLL) instead of regular libraries. A target property that can be set to override the suffix (such as .lib) on an import library name.
trans-unit.target: 与目标属性 SUFFIX 相似，但是用于导入库（通常对应于 DLL ）而不是常规库。可以设置目标属性以覆盖导入库名称上的后缀（例如 .lib ）。

trans-unit.source: Since CMake 3.19, Interface Libraries may have arbitrary target properties. If a project exports an interface library with custom properties, the resulting package may not work with dependents configured by older versions of CMake that reject the custom properties.
trans-unit.target: 从CMake 3.19开始，接口库可以具有任意目标属性。如果项目导出具有自定义属性的接口库，则结果包可能无法与由较早版本的CMake拒绝自定义属性的配置的依赖项一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Since CMake 3.19, an INTERFACE library target may optionally contain source files. An interface library that contains source files will be included as a build target in the generated buildsystem. It does not compile sources, but may contain custom commands to generate other sources. Additionally, IDEs will show the source files as part of the target for interactive reading and editing.
trans-unit.target: 从CMake 3.19开始， INTERFACE 库目标可以选择包含源文件。包含源文件的接口库将作为生成目标包含在生成的构建系统中。它不编译源代码，但可能包含用于生成其他源代码的自定义命令。此外，IDE会将源文件显示为目标的一部分，以进行交互式阅读和编辑。

trans-unit.target: 由于生成器表达式是在生成系统的过程中而不是在处理 CMakeLists.txt 文件的过程中评估的，因此无法使用 message() 命令检查其结果。

trans-unit.source: Since setup and cleanup tasks are also tests, they can have an ordering specified by the DEPENDS test property just like any other tests. This can be exploited to implement setup or cleanup using multiple tests for a single fixture to modularise setup or cleanup logic.
trans-unit.target: 由于设置和清除任务也是测试，因此它们可以像其他任何测试一样具有由 DEPENDS 测试属性指定的顺序。可以利用它对单个夹具使用多个测试来实施设置或清理，以模块化设置或清理逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Since the above approach does not tell CMake what custom command generates byproduct.txt, the Ninja generator does not have enough information to add the byproduct as an output of any rule. CMake 2.8.12 and above work around this problem and allow projects using the above approach to build by generating phony build rules to tell Ninja to tolerate such missing files. However, this workaround prevents Ninja from diagnosing a dependency that is really missing. It also works poorly in in-source builds where every custom command dependency, even on source files, needs to be treated this way because CMake does not have enough information to know which files are generated as byproducts of custom commands.
trans-unit.target: 由于上述方法没有告诉CMake哪个定制命令会生成 byproduct.txt ，因此Ninja生成器没有足够的信息来将副产品添加为任何规则的输出。 CMake 2.8.12及更高版本可解决此问题，并允许通过使用上述方法生成的项目通过生成 phony 构建规则来告诉Ninja忍受此类丢失的文件。但是，此替代方法可以防止Ninja诊断确实缺少的依赖项。它在源代码内部版本中的效果也很差，因为需要使用这种方式来处理每个自定义命令的依赖关系，即使是对源文件也是如此，因为CMake没有足够的信息来知道哪些文件是作为自定义命令的副产品生成的。

trans-unit.source: So that relative input paths work as expected, by default the working directory of the Doxygen command will be the current source directory (i.e. CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR). This can be overridden with the WORKING_DIRECTORY option to change the directory used as the relative base point. Note also that Doxygen’s default behavior is to strip the working directory from relative paths in the generated documentation (see the STRIP_FROM_PATHDoxygen config option for details).

trans-unit.source: Software Installation
trans-unit.target: 软件安装

trans-unit.source: Software projects often require variables to be set on the command line when invoking CMake. Some of the most commonly used CMake variables are listed in the table below:
trans-unit.target: 软件项目在调用CMake时,经常需要在命令行中设置变量。一些最常用的CMake变量列在下面的表格中。

trans-unit.source: Some CMake generators support a platform name to be given to the native build system to choose a compiler or SDK. See the CMAKE_GENERATOR_PLATFORM variable for details.
trans-unit.target: 一些CMake生成器支持将平台名称提供给本机构建系统以选择编译器或SDK。有关详细信息，请参见 CMAKE_GENERATOR_PLATFORM 变量。

trans-unit.source: Some CMake generators support a target platform name to be given to the native build system to choose a compiler toolchain. If the user specifies a platform name (e.g. via the cmake(1)-A option or via the CMAKE_GENERATOR_PLATFORM environment variable) the value will be available in this variable.
trans-unit.target: 一些CMake生成器支持将目标平台名称提供给本机构建系统以选择编译器工具链。如果用户指定平台名称（例如，通过 cmake(1) -A 选项或通过 CMAKE_GENERATOR_PLATFORM 环境变量），则该变量中的值将可用。

trans-unit.source: Some CMake generators support a toolset specification to tell the native build system how to choose a compiler. If the user specifies a toolset (e.g. via the cmake(1)-T option or via the CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET environment variable) the value will be available in this variable.
trans-unit.target: 一些CMake生成器支持工具集规范，以告诉本机生成系统如何选择编译器。如果用户指定了工具集（例如，通过 cmake(1) -T 选项或通过 CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET 环境变量），则该变量中的值将可用。

trans-unit.source: Some CMake generators support a toolset specification to tell the native build system how to choose a compiler. See the CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET variable for details.
trans-unit.target: 一些CMake生成器支持工具集规范，以告诉本机生成系统如何选择编译器。有关详细信息，请参见 CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET 变量。

trans-unit.source: Some CMake generators support selection of an instance of the native build system when multiple instances are available. If the user specifies an instance (e.g. by setting this cache entry or via the CMAKE_GENERATOR_INSTANCE environment variable), or after a default instance is chosen when a build tree is first configured, the value will be available in this variable.
trans-unit.target: 当多个实例可用时，某些CMake生成器支持选择本机生成系统的一个实例。如果用户指定了实例（例如，通过设置此缓存条目或通过 CMAKE_GENERATOR_INSTANCE 环境变量），或者在首次配置构建树时选择了默认实例后，则该变量中将提供该值。

trans-unit.source: Some CMake-generated build trees can have multiple build configurations in the same tree. This option can be used to specify which one should be tested. Example configurations are Debug and Release.
trans-unit.target: 某些CMake生成的构建树可以在同一树中具有多个构建配置。此选项可用于指定应测试的一个。示例配置为 Debug 和 Release 。

trans-unit.source: Some IDEs such as KDevelop4, QtCreator and CLion have native support for CMake-based buildsystems. Those IDEs provide user interface for selecting an underlying generator to use, typically a choice between a Makefile or a Ninja based generator.
trans-unit.target: 某些IDE（例如KDevelop4，QtCreator和CLion）对基于CMake的构建系统具有本机支持。这些IDE提供了用于选择要使用的基础生成器的用户界面，通常是在 Makefile 或基于 Ninja 的生成器之间进行选择。

trans-unit.source: Some Linux systems utilize GLVND as a new ABI for OpenGL. GLVND separates context libraries from OpenGL itself; OpenGL lives in “libOpenGL”, and contexts are defined in “libGLX” or “libEGL”. GLVND is currently the only way to get OpenGL 3+ functionality via EGL in a manner portable across vendors. Projects may use GLVND explicitly with target OpenGL::OpenGL and either OpenGL::GLX or OpenGL::EGL.
trans-unit.target: 一些Linux系统利用GLVND作为OpenGL的新ABI。 GLVND将上下文库与OpenGL本身分开； OpenGL位于“ libOpenGL”中，上下文在“ libGLX”或“ libEGL”中定义。目前，GLVND是通过EGL以跨供应商移植的方式获得OpenGL 3+功能的唯一方法。项目可以在目标 OpenGL::OpenGL 和 OpenGL::GLX 或 OpenGL::EGL 显式使用GLVND 。

trans-unit.source: Some additional symbol-defines are created for particular features for use as symbols which may be conditionally defined empty:
trans-unit.target: 一些额外的符号定义是为特定的功能创建的,作为符号使用,可以有条件地定义为空。

trans-unit.source: Some archive formats allow the type of compression to be specified. The 7zip and zip archive formats already imply a specific type of compression. The other formats use no compression by default, but can be directed to do so with the COMPRESSION option. Valid values for <compression> are None, BZip2, GZip, XZ, and Zstd.
trans-unit.target: 某些存档格式允许指定压缩类型。该 7zip 的和 zip 的压缩格式已经暗示压缩的特定类型。其他格式默认情况下不使用压缩，但是可以使用 COMPRESSION 选项进行定向。为有效值 <compression> 是 None ， BZip2 压缩， GZip 压缩， XZ 和 Zstd 。

trans-unit.source: Some build artifacts for the embedded Apple platforms require mandatory code signing. If the Xcode generator is being used and code signing is required or desired, the development team ID can be specified via the CMAKE_XCODE_ATTRIBUTE_DEVELOPMENT_TEAM CMake variable. This team ID will then be included in the generated Xcode project. By default, CMake avoids the need for code signing during the internal configuration phase (i.e compiler ID and feature detection).
trans-unit.target: 嵌入式Apple平台的某些构建工件需要强制性代码签名。如果正在使用 Xcode 生成器，并且需要或希望进行代码签名，则可以通过 CMAKE_XCODE_ATTRIBUTE_DEVELOPMENT_TEAM CMake变量指定开发团队ID 。然后，该团队ID将包含在生成的Xcode项目中。默认情况下，CMake避免在内部配置阶段（即编译器ID和功能检测）进行代码签名。

trans-unit.source: Some build artifacts for the embedded Apple platforms require mandatory code signing. If the Xcode generator is being used and code signing is required or desired, the development team ID can be specified via the CMAKE_XCODE_ATTRIBUTE_DEVELOPMENT_TEAM CMake variable. This team ID will then be included in the generated Xcode project. By default, CMake avoids the need for code signing during the internal configuration phase (i.e compiler ID and feature detection).
trans-unit.target: 嵌入式Apple平台的某些构建工件需要强制性的代码签名。如果正在使用 Xcode 生成器，并且需要或希望进行代码签名，则可以通过 CMAKE_XCODE_ATTRIBUTE_DEVELOPMENT_TEAM CMake变量指定开发团队ID 。然后，该团队ID将包含在生成的Xcode项目中。默认情况下，CMake避免在内部配置阶段（即编译器ID和功能检测）进行代码签名。

The buildsystem for the IDEs such as Visual Studio and Xcode are generated independent of the build-configuration, and the actual build configuration is not known until build-time. Therefore, code such as

trans-unit.source: Some compiler drivers are inherently cross-compilers, such as clang and QNX qcc. These compiler drivers support a command-line argument to specify the target to cross-compile for.
trans-unit.target: 有些编译器驱动程序本身就是交叉编译器,如 clang 和 QNX qcc。这些编译器驱动程序支持命令行参数来指定要交叉编译的目标。

trans-unit.source: Some compiler toolchains do not ship their own auxiliary utilities such as archivers and linkers. The compiler driver may support a command-line argument to specify the location of such tools. CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_EXTERNAL_TOOLCHAIN may be set to a path to the external toolchain and will be passed to the compiler driver if supported.
trans-unit.target: 某些编译器工具链不附带其自己的辅助实用程序，例如存档器和链接器。编译器驱动程序可以支持命令行参数来指定此类工具的位置。 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_EXTERNAL_TOOLCHAIN 可以设置为外部工具链的路径，如果支持，则将其传递给编译器驱动程序。

trans-unit.source: Some compilers simulate other compilers to serve as drop-in replacements. When CMake detects such a compiler it sets this variable to what would have been the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID for the simulated compiler.
trans-unit.target: 一些编译器会模拟其他编译器以充当嵌入式替换。当CMake检测到这样的编译器时，它将将此变量设置为模拟编译器的 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID 。

trans-unit.source: Some compilers simulate other compilers to serve as drop-in replacements. When CMake detects such a compiler it sets this variable to what would have been the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_VERSION for the simulated compiler.
trans-unit.target: 一些编译器会模拟其他编译器以充当嵌入式替换。当CMake检测到这样的编译器时，它将设置此变量为模拟编译器的 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_VERSION 。

trans-unit.source: Some linkers support switches such as -Bstatic and -Bdynamic to determine whether to use static or shared libraries for -lXXX options. CMake uses these options to set the link type for libraries whose full paths are not known or (in some cases) are in implicit link directories for the platform. By default CMake adds an option at the end of the library list (if necessary) to set the linker search type back to its starting type. This property switches the final linker search type to -Bstatic regardless of how it started.
trans-unit.target: 某些链接器支持 -Bstatic 和 -Bdynamic 之类的开关来确定是将静态库还是共享库用于 -lXXX 选项。CMake使用这些选项来设置其完整路径未知或（在某些情况下）在平台的隐式链接目录中的库的链接类型。默认情况下，CMake在库列表的末尾添加一个选项（如有必要），以将链接器搜索类型设置回其起始类型。该属性将最终链接程序搜索类型切换为 -Bstatic ,而不管其启动方式如何。

trans-unit.source: Some linkers support switches such as -Bstatic and -Bdynamic to determine whether to use static or shared libraries for -lXXX options. CMake uses these options to set the link type for libraries whose full paths are not known or (in some cases) are in implicit link directories for the platform. By default the linker search type is assumed to be -Bdynamic at the beginning of the library list. This property switches the assumption to -Bstatic. It is intended for use when linking an executable statically (e.g. with the GNU -static option).
trans-unit.target: 某些链接器支持 -Bstatic 和 -Bdynamic 之类的开关来确定是将静态库还是共享库用于 -lXXX 选项。 CMake使用这些选项来设置其完整路径未知或（在某些情况下）在平台的隐式链接目录中的库的链接类型。默认情况下，在库列表的开头假定链接器搜索类型为 -Bdynamic 。此属性将假设切换为 -Bstatic 。它用于静态链接可执行文件时（例如，使用GNU -static 选项）。

trans-unit.source: Some native build tools always build in parallel. The use of <jobs> value of 1 can be used to limit to a single job.
trans-unit.target: 一些本地构建工具总是并行构建。使用 <jobs> 的值 1 可以被用来限制到一个单一的作业。

trans-unit.source: Some packages can wrap source files into alternate languages to provide additional functionality.
trans-unit.target: 一些软件包可以将源文件包装成其他语言以提供额外的功能。

trans-unit.source: Some provided software may specify uninstall rules, but CMake does not generate such rules by default itself.
trans-unit.target: 某些提供的软件可能会指定 uninstall 规则，但默认情况下，CMake不会生成此类规则。

trans-unit.source: Some target properties are required to be compatible between a target and the interface of each dependency. For example, the POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE target property may specify a boolean value of whether a target should be compiled as position-independent-code, which has platform-specific consequences. A target may also specify the usage requirement INTERFACE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE to communicate that consumers must be compiled as position-independent-code.
trans-unit.target: 一些目标属性需要在目标和每个依赖项的接口之间兼容。例如， POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 目标属性可以指定布尔值，该布尔值指示是否应将目标编译为与位置无关的代码，这将导致特定于平台的结果。目标还可以指定使用要求 INTERFACE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ,以传达必须将使用者编译为与位置无关的代码的信息。

trans-unit.source: Some target types do not represent outputs of the buildsystem, but only inputs such as external dependencies, aliases or other non-build artifacts. Pseudo targets are not represented in the generated buildsystem.
trans-unit.target: 有些目标类型不代表构建系统的输出,而只代表输入,如外部依赖、别名或其他非构建工件。在生成的构建系统中不表示伪目标。

trans-unit.source: Some toolchain features have built-in handling in CMake, and do not require compile-tests. For example, POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE allows specifying that a target should be built as position-independent code, if the compiler supports that feature. The <LANG>_VISIBILITY_PRESET and VISIBILITY_INLINES_HIDDEN target properties add flags for hidden visibility, if supported by the compiler.
trans-unit.target: 某些工具链功能在CMake中具有内置处理功能，并且不需要编译测试。例如，如果编译器支持目标，则 POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 允许指定应将目标构建为与位置无关的代码。所述 <LANG>_VISIBILITY_PRESET 和 VISIBILITY_INLINES_HIDDEN 目标属性添加标志隐藏可视性，如果编译器所支持。

trans-unit.source: Some toolchains read implicit directories from an environment variable such as LIBRARY_PATH. If using such an environment variable, keep its value consistent when operating in a given build tree because CMake saves the value detected when first creating a build tree.
trans-unit.target: 一些工具链从环境变量（例如 LIBRARY_PATH )读取隐式目录。如果使用这样的环境变量，则在给定的构建树中操作时，使其值保持一致，因为CMake会保存首次创建构建树时检测到的值。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes only a test itself can determine if all requirements for the test are met. If such a situation should not be considered a hard failure a return code of the process can be specified that will mark the test as Not Run if it is encountered. Valid values are in the range of 0 to 255, inclusive.

trans-unit.source: Specified include directories may be absolute paths or relative paths. Repeated calls for the same <target> append items in the order called. If SYSTEM is specified, the compiler will be told the directories are meant as system include directories on some platforms (signalling this setting might achieve effects such as the compiler skipping warnings, or these fixed-install system files not being considered in dependency calculations - see compiler docs). If SYSTEM is used together with PUBLIC or INTERFACE, the INTERFACE_SYSTEM_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES target property will be populated with the specified directories.
trans-unit.target: 指定的包含目录可以是绝对路径或相对路径。重复调用相同的<target>会按调用顺序追加项目。如果指定了 SYSTEM ，则会在某些平台上告诉编译器目录的含义是系统包含目录（对此设置进行信号化可能会产生效果，例如编译器跳过警告，或者在依赖性计算中不考虑这些固定安装的系统文件-请参阅编译器文档）。如果 SYSTEM 与 PUBLIC 或 INTERFACE 一起使用，则 INTERFACE_SYSTEM_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 目标属性将使用指定的目录填充。

trans-unit.source: Specifies Java classes used to generate headers.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于生成标题的Java类。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a semicolon-separated list of configurations available from all build-<Config>.ninja files in the Ninja Multi-Config generator. This variable activates cross-config mode. Targets from each config specified in this variable can be built from any build-<Config>.ninja file. Custom commands will use the configuration native to build-<Config>.ninja. If it is set to all, all configurations from CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES are cross-configs. If it is not specified, or empty, each build-<Config>.ninja file will only contain build rules for its own configuration.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Ninja Multi-Config 生成器中所有 build-<Config>.ninja 文件中可用的配置的分号分隔列表。此变量激活交叉配置模式。可以从任何 build-<Config>.ninja 文件构建此变量中指定的每个配置的目标。定制命令将使用 build-<Config>.ninja 的本机配置。如果将其设置为 all ，则 CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES 中的所有配置都是交叉配置。如果未指定或为空，则每个 build-<Config>.ninja 文件将仅包含其自身配置的构建规则。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a semicolon-separated list of configurations to build for a target in build.ninja if no :<Config> suffix is specified in the Ninja Multi-Config generator. If it is set to all, all configurations from CMAKE_CROSS_CONFIGS are used. If it is not specified, it defaults to CMAKE_DEFAULT_BUILD_TYPE.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 Ninja Multi-Config 生成器中未指定 :<Config> 后缀，则指定要在 build.ninja 中为目标构建的配置的分号分隔列表。如果将其设置为 all ， CMAKE_CROSS_CONFIGS 将使用CMAKE_CROSS_CONFIGS中的所有配置。如果未指定，则默认为 CMAKE_DEFAULT_BUILD_TYPE 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a semicolon-separated list of full-paths to files on which any object files compiled from this source file depend. On Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator an object file will be recompiled if any of the named files is newer than it. Visual Studio Generators and the Xcode generator cannot implement such compilation dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 指定用分号分隔的完整路径列表，该文件是从该源文件编译的任何目标文件所依赖的文件的完整路径。在Makefile生成器和 Ninja 生成器上，如果任何命名文件比其更新，则将重新编译目标文件。Visual Studio生成器和 Xcode 生成器无法实现此类编译依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a semicolon-separated list of full-paths to files on which any object files compiled from this source file depend. On Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator an object file will be recompiled if any of the named files is newer than it. Visual Studio Generators and the Xcode generator cannot implement such compilation dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 指定用分号分隔的完整路径列表，该文件是从此源文件编译的任何目标文件所依赖的文件的完整路径。在Makefile生成器和 Ninja 生成器上，如果任何命名文件比它新，则将重新编译目标文件。Visual Studio生成器和 Xcode 生成器无法实现此类编译依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a prefix to be prepended to the name of each discovered test case. This can be useful when the same source files are being used in multiple calls to gtest_add_test() but with different EXTRA_ARGS.
trans-unit.target: 指定在每个发现的测试用例名称之前添加的 prefix 。当在多次调用 gtest_add_test() 的过程中使用相同的源文件，但使用不同的 EXTRA_ARGS 时，这将很有用。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a prefix to be prepended to the name of each discovered test case. This can be useful when the same test executable is being used in multiple calls to gtest_discover_tests() but with different EXTRA_ARGS.
trans-unit.target: 指定在每个发现的测试用例名称之前添加的 prefix 。当在多次调用 gtest_discover_tests() 的过程中使用相同的测试可执行文件，但使用不同的 EXTRA_ARGS 时，这将很有用。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a custom command to patch the sources after an update. By default, no patch command is defined. Note that it can be quite difficult to define an appropriate patch command that performs robustly, especially for download methods such as git where changing the GIT_TAG will not discard changes from a previous patch, but the patch command will be called again after updating to the new tag.
trans-unit.target: 指定自定义命令以在更新后修补源。缺省情况下，未定义补丁命令。请注意，很难定义一个健壮的适当补丁程序命令，尤其是对于git之类的下载方法而言，更改 GIT_TAG 不会放弃先前补丁程序的更改，但是在更新到新补丁程序后将再次调用patch命令标签。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a file name for the compiled shader object file for an .hlsl source file. This adds the -Fo flag to the command line for the FxCompiler tool.
trans-unit.target: 为 .hlsl 源文件指定编译的着色器目标文件的文件名。这会将 -Fo 标志添加到FxCompiler工具的命令行中。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of fixtures for which the test is to be treated as a cleanup test. These fixture names are distinct from test case names and are not required to have any similarity to the names of tests associated with them.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个固定装置的列表,对于这些固定装置,测试将被视为清理测试。这些固定装置的名称与测试用例的名称不同,不需要与与它们相关的测试名称有任何相似之处。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of fixtures for which the test is to be treated as a setup test. These fixture names are distinct from test case names and are not required to have any similarity to the names of tests associated with them.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个夹具列表,对于这些夹具,测试将被视为设置测试。这些固定装置的名称与测试用例的名称不同,不需要与与它们相关的测试名称有任何相似之处。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of fixtures the test requires. Fixture names are case sensitive and they are not required to have any similarity to test names.
trans-unit.target: 指定测试所需的夹具列表,夹具名称是区分大小写的,不需要与测试名称有任何相似之处。夹具名称是区分大小写的,它们不需要与测试名称有任何相似之处。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a semicolon-separated list of full-paths to files on which the link rule for this target depends. The target binary will be linked if any of the named files is newer than it.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个以分号分隔的文件全路径列表,该目标的链接规则依赖于该列表。如果任何命名的文件比它新,目标二进制文件将被链接。

trans-unit.source: Specifies access permissions for files or directories installed by a WiX installer.
trans-unit.target: 指定WiX安装程序安装的文件或目录的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Specifies additional properties to be set on all tests discovered by this invocation of gtest_discover_tests().
trans-unit.target: 指定在通过调用 gtest_discover_tests() 发现的所有测试上设置的附加属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies additional properties to be set on all tests discovered by this invocation of gtest_discover_tests.
trans-unit.target: 指定在通过调用 gtest_discover_tests 发现的所有测试上设置的其他属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies compile definitions to use when compiling a given <target>. The named <target> must have been created by a command such as add_executable() or add_library() and must not be an ALIAS target.
trans-unit.target: 指定在编译给定的 <target> 时要使用的编译定义。命名的 <target> 必须由诸如 add_executable() 或 add_library() 之类的命令创建，并且不能为ALIAS target。

trans-unit.source: Specifies compiler features required when compiling a given target. If the feature is not listed in the CMAKE_C_COMPILE_FEATURES variable or CMAKE_CXX_COMPILE_FEATURES variable, then an error will be reported by CMake. If the use of the feature requires an additional compiler flag, such as -std=gnu++11, the flag will be added automatically.
trans-unit.target: 指定编译给定目标时所需的编译器功能。如果 CMAKE_C_COMPILE_FEATURES 变量或 CMAKE_CXX_COMPILE_FEATURES 变量中未列出功能，则CMake将报告错误。如果使用该功能需要附加的编译器标志，例如 -std=gnu++11 ，则该标志将自动添加。

trans-unit.source: Specifies compiler features required when compiling a given target. If the feature is not listed in the CMAKE_C_COMPILE_FEATURES, CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILE_FEATURES, or CMAKE_CXX_COMPILE_FEATURES variables, then an error will be reported by CMake. If the use of the feature requires an additional compiler flag, such as -std=gnu++11, the flag will be added automatically.
trans-unit.target: 指定编译给定目标时所需的编译器功能。如果 CMAKE_C_COMPILE_FEATURES ， CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILE_FEATURES 或 CMAKE_CXX_COMPILE_FEATURES 变量中未列出功能，则CMake将报告错误。如果使用此功能需要附加的编译器标志，例如 -std=gnu++11 ，则该标志将自动添加。

trans-unit.source: Specifies files that will be generated by the build command but which might or might not have their modification time updated by subsequent builds. These ultimately get passed through as BYPRODUCTS to the build step’s own underlying call to add_custom_command().
trans-unit.target: 指定将由build命令生成的文件，但是它们的修改时间可能会或可能不会被后续版本更新。这些最终作为 BYPRODUCTS 传递到构建步骤自己对 add_custom_command() 的基础调用。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how long (in seconds) CMake will wait for the test to enumerate available tests. If the test takes longer than this, discovery (and your build) will fail. Most test executables will enumerate their tests very quickly, but under some exceptional circumstances, a test may require a longer timeout. The default is 5. See also the TIMEOUT option of execute_process().
trans-unit.target: 指定CMake等待测试枚举可用测试的时间（以秒为单位）。如果测试花费的时间超过此时间，则发现（和您的构建）将失败。大多数测试可执行文件会很快枚举其测试，但是在某些特殊情况下，测试可能需要更长的超时时间。默认值为5。另请参见 execute_process() 的 TIMEOUT 选项。

trans-unit.source: Specifies include directories to use when compiling a given target. The named <target> must have been created by a command such as add_executable() or add_library() and must not be an ALIAS target.
trans-unit.target: 指定在编译给定目标时要使用的包含目录。命名的 <target> 必须由诸如 add_executable() 或 add_library() 之类的命令创建，并且不能为ALIAS target。

trans-unit.source: Specifies language whose compiler will invoke the linker.
trans-unit.target: 指定编译器将调用链接器的语言。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one of the Object Kinds to be included in the reply.
trans-unit.target: 指定要包含在回复中的对象种类之一。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one of the supported Object Kinds.
trans-unit.target: 指定受支持的对象种类之一。

trans-unit.source: Specifies sources to use when building a target and/or its dependents. Relative source file paths are interpreted as being relative to the current source directory (i.e. CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR). The named <target> must have been created by a command such as add_executable() or add_library() and must not be an ALIAS target.
trans-unit.target: 指定在构建目标和/或其依赖项时要使用的源。相对源文件路径被解释为相对于当前源目录（即 CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR ）。命名的 <target> 必须由诸如 add_executable() 或 add_library() 之类的命令创建，并且不能为ALIAS target。

trans-unit.source: Specifies sources to use when compiling a given target. Relative source file paths are interpreted as being relative to the current source directory (i.e. CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR). The named <target> must have been created by a command such as add_executable() or add_library() and must not be an ALIAS target.
trans-unit.target: 指定在编译给定目标时要使用的源。相对源文件路径被解释为相对于当前源目录（即 CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR ）。命名的 <target> 必须由诸如 add_executable() 或 add_library() 之类的命令创建，并且不能为ALIAS target。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that an IMPORTED shared library target has no soname.
trans-unit.target: 指定 IMPORTED 共享库目标没有 soname 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the target should be compiled as a Continuous Background Task library.
trans-unit.target: 指定目标应被编译为持续后台任务库。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that this test should only be run after the specified list of tests.
trans-unit.target: 指定该测试只能在指定的测试列表之后运行。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the CMake default generator to use when no generator is supplied with -G. If the provided value doesn’t name a generator known by CMake, the internal default is used. Either way the resulting generator selection is stored in the CMAKE_GENERATOR variable.
trans-unit.target: 指定 -G 没有提供生成器时使用的CMake默认生成器。如果提供的值未命名CMake已知的生成器，则使用内部默认值。无论哪种方式，生成的生成器选择都存储在 CMAKE_GENERATOR 变量中。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Google Test executable, which must be a known CMake executable target. CMake will substitute the location of the built executable when running the test.
trans-unit.target: 指定Google测试可执行文件,它必须是一个已知的CMake可执行文件目标。当运行测试时,CMake将替代构建的可执行文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the available build types on multi-config generators.
trans-unit.target: 指定多配置生成器上的可用构建类型。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the build type on single-configuration generators.
trans-unit.target: 指定单配置生成器的构建类型。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the configuration to use by default in a build.ninja file in the Ninja Multi-Config generator. If this variable is specified, build.ninja uses build rules from build-<Config>.ninja by default. All custom commands are executed with this configuration. If the variable is not specified, the first item from CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES is used instead.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Ninja Multi-Config 生成器中的 build.ninja 文件默认使用的配置。如果指定了此变量，则默认情况下 build.ninja 使用 build-<Config>.ninja 中的构建规则。使用此配置执行所有自定义命令。如果未指定变量，则使用 CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES 中的第一项。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the deployment location for a content source file with a Windows Phone or Windows Store application when built with a Visual Studio generators. This property is only applicable when using VS_DEPLOYMENT_CONTENT. The value represent the path relative to the app package and applies to all configurations.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Visual Studio generators 构建时，为Windows Phone或Windows Store应用程序指定内容源文件的部署位置。该属性仅在使用 VS_DEPLOYMENT_CONTENT 时适用。该值表示相对于应用程序包的路径，并适用于所有配置。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the directory in which to run the discovered test cases. If this option is not provided, the current binary directory is used.
trans-unit.target: 指定运行已发现的测试用例的目录,如果没有提供这个选项,则使用当前的二进制目录。如果没有提供这个选项,则使用当前的二进制目录。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of concurrent processes to use when building using the cmake --build command line Build Tool Mode.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用 cmake --build 命令行“ 构建工具模式”进行构建时要使用的最大并发进程数。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of source files that can be combined into any one unity source file when unity builds are enabled by the UNITY_BUILD target property. The original source files will be distributed across as many unity source files as necessary to honor this limit.
trans-unit.target: 指定当 UNITY_BUILD 目标属性启用统一构建时，可以合并到任何一个统一源文件中的最大源文件数。原始源文件将根据需要分布在尽可能多的统一源文件中。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the entry point for the shader of a .hlsl source file.
trans-unit.target: 指定 .hlsl 源文件的着色器的入口点名称。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the paths in which the linker should search for libraries when linking a given target. Each item can be an absolute or relative path, with the latter being interpreted as relative to the current source directory. These items will be added to the link command.
trans-unit.target: 指定链接器在链接给定目标时应该搜索库的路径。每项可以是绝对路径或相对路径,后者被解释为相对于当前源目录。这些项目将被添加到链接命令中。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the shader model of a .hlsl source file. Some shader types can only be used with recent shader models
trans-unit.target: 指定 .hlsl 源文件的着色器模型。某些着色器类型只能与最新的着色器模型一起使用

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the Desktop Extensions that should be included in the target. For example 10.0.10240.0. If the value is not specified, the Desktop Extensions will not be included. To use the same version of the extensions as the Windows 10 SDK that is being used, you can use the CMAKE_VS_WINDOWS_TARGET_PLATFORM_VERSION variable.
trans-unit.target: 指定应包含在目标中的桌面扩展的版本。例如 10.0.10240.0 。如果未指定该值，将不包括Desktop Extensions。要使用与所使用的Windows 10 SDK相同的扩展版本，可以使用 CMAKE_VS_WINDOWS_TARGET_PLATFORM_VERSION 变量。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the IoT Extensions that should be included in the target. For example 10.0.10240.0. If the value is not specified, the IoT Extensions will not be included. To use the same version of the extensions as the Windows 10 SDK that is being used, you can use the CMAKE_VS_WINDOWS_TARGET_PLATFORM_VERSION variable.
trans-unit.target: 指定应包含在目标中的IoT扩展的版本。例如 10.0.10240.0 。如果未指定该值，则不包括IoT扩展。要使用与所使用的Windows 10 SDK相同的扩展版本，可以使用 CMAKE_VS_WINDOWS_TARGET_PLATFORM_VERSION 变量。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the Mobile Extensions that should be included in the target. For example 10.0.10240.0. If the value is not specified, the Mobile Extensions will not be included. To use the same version of the extensions as the Windows 10 SDK that is being used, you can use the CMAKE_VS_WINDOWS_TARGET_PLATFORM_VERSION variable.
trans-unit.target: 指定目标中应包含的移动扩展的版本。例如 10.0.10240.0 。如果未指定该值，那么将不包括移动扩展。要使用与所使用的Windows 10 SDK相同的扩展版本，可以使用 CMAKE_VS_WINDOWS_TARGET_PLATFORM_VERSION 变量。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the working directory to set before running the custom step’s command. If this option is not specified, the directory will be the value of the CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR at the point where ExternalProject_Add_Step() was called.
trans-unit.target: 指定在运行定制步骤的命令之前要设置的工作目录。如果没有指定这个选项时，该目录将成为价值 CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR 在点在哪里 ExternalProject_Add_Step() 被调用。

trans-unit.source: Specifies various paths to look up classes. Here .class files, jar files or targets created by command add_jar can be used.
trans-unit.target: 指定各种查找类的路径。这里可以使用.class文件、jar文件或通过命令add_jar创建的目标。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether pkg_check_modules() and pkg_search_module() should add the paths in the CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH, CMAKE_FRAMEWORK_PATH and CMAKE_APPBUNDLE_PATH cache and environment variables to the pkg-config search path.
trans-unit.target: 指定 pkg_check_modules() 和 pkg_search_module() 是否应将 CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH ， CMAKE_FRAMEWORK_PATH 和 CMAKE_APPBUNDLE_PATH 高速缓存以及环境变量中的路径添加到 pkg-config 搜索路径。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether certificate verification should be performed for https URLs. If this option is not provided, the default behavior is determined by the CMAKE_TLS_VERIFY variable (see file(DOWNLOAD)). If that is also not set, certificate verification will not be performed. In situations where URL_HASH cannot be provided, this option can be an alternative verification measure.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否应该对https URL执行证书验证。如果未提供此选项，则默认行为由 CMAKE_TLS_VERIFY 变量确定（请参见 file(DOWNLOAD) ）。如果还没有设置，将不会执行证书验证。在无法提供 URL_HASH 的情况下，此选项可以作为替代验证措施。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether this step is independent of the external dependencies specified by the ExternalProject_Add()’s DEPENDS option. The default is FALSE. Steps marked as independent may depend only on other steps marked independent. See policy CMP0114.
trans-unit.target: 指定此步骤是否独立于 ExternalProject_Add() 的 DEPENDS 选项指定的外部依赖项。默认值为 FALSE 。标记为独立的步骤可能仅取决于标记为独立的其他步骤。请参阅策略 CMP0114 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to trust the Subversion server site certificate. If enabled, the --trust-server-cert option is passed to the svn checkout and update commands.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否信任Subversion服务器站点证书。如果启用，则 --trust-server-cert 选项将传递到 svn checkout和update命令。

trans-unit.source: Specify #include line transforms for dependencies in a target.
trans-unit.target: 为目标中的依赖关系指定#include行变换。

trans-unit.source: Specify #include line transforms for dependencies in a directory.
trans-unit.target: 为目录中的依赖性指定 #include 行转换。

trans-unit.source: Specify #include line transforms for dependencies in a target.
trans-unit.target: 为目标中的依赖项指定 #include 行转换。

trans-unit.source: Specify -Ddefinition arguments to pass to add_definitions() in the generated test project.
trans-unit.target: 指定 -Ddefinition 自变量以传递给生成的测试项目中的 add_definitions() 。

trans-unit.source: Specify Compile Definition
trans-unit.target: 指定编译定义

trans-unit.source: Specify HTTP header to be included in the request to CDash during submission. For example, CDash can be configured to only accept submissions from authenticated clients. In this case, you should provide a bearer token in your header:
trans-unit.target: 指定在提交过程中要包含在向CDash的请求中的HTTP头。例如,CDash可以被配置为只接受来自已认证客户的提交。在这种情况下,您应该在头中提供一个不记名标记。

trans-unit.source: Specify a resource specification file.
trans-unit.target: 指定资源规范文件。

trans-unit.source: Specify a semicolon-separated list containing a command line for a compiler launching tool. The Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator will run this tool and pass the compiler and its arguments to the tool. Some example tools are distcc and ccache.
trans-unit.target: 指定以分号分隔的列表，其中包含用于编译器启动工具的命令行。在Makefile文件发电机和 Ninja 发电机将运行该工具，并通过编译器和它的参数的工具。一些示例工具是distcc和ccache。

trans-unit.source: Specify a semicolon-separated list containing a command line for a compiler launching tool. The Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator will run this tool and pass the compiler and its arguments to the tool. Some example tools are distcc and ccache.
trans-unit.target: 指定以分号分隔的列表，其中包含用于编译器启动工具的命令行。在Makefile文件发电机和 Ninja 发电机将运行该工具，并通过编译器和它的参数的工具。一些示例工具是distcc和ccache。

trans-unit.source: Specify a semicolon-separated list containing a command line for the clang-tidy tool. The Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator will run this tool along with the compiler and report a warning if the tool reports any problems.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个用分号分隔的列表，其中包含 clang-tidy 工具的命令行。在Makefile文件发电机和 Ninja 发电机将与编译器一起运行此工具，如果工具报告任何问题报告警告。

trans-unit.source: Specify a semicolon-separated list containing a command line for the clang-tidy tool. The Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator will run this tool along with the compiler and report a warning if the tool reports any problems.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个用分号分隔的列表，其中包含 clang-tidy 工具的命令行。在Makefile文件发电机和 Ninja 发电机将与编译器一起运行此工具，如果工具报告任何问题报告警告。

trans-unit.source: Specify a semicolon-separated list containing a command line for the cppcheck static analysis tool. The Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator will run cppcheck along with the compiler and report any problems. If the command-line specifies the exit code options to cppcheck then the build will fail if the tool returns non-zero.
trans-unit.target: 指定以分号分隔的列表，其中包含 cppcheck 静态分析工具的命令行。在Makefile文件发电机和 Ninja 发电机将运行 cppcheck 与编译器一起，并报告任何问题。如果命令行将退出代码选项指定为 cppcheck ,则如果该工具返回非零值，则构建将失败。

trans-unit.source: Specify a semicolon-separated list containing a command line for the cppcheck static analysis tool. The Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator will run cppcheck along with the compiler and report any problems. If the command-line specifies the exit code options to cppcheck then the build will fail if the tool returns non-zero.
trans-unit.target: 指定以分号分隔的列表，其中包含 cppcheck 静态分析工具的命令行。在Makefile文件发电机和 Ninja 发电机将运行 cppcheck 与编译器一起，并报告任何问题。如果命令行将退出代码选项指定为 cppcheck ,则如果该工具返回非零值，则构建将失败。

trans-unit.source: Specify a variable in which to store the identification for the deferred call. If ID <id> is not given, a new identification will be generated and the generated id will start with an underscore (_).
trans-unit.target: 指定一个变量，用于在其中存储延迟调用的标识。如果未提供 ID <id> ，则将生成一个新的标识，并且生成的ID将以下划线（ _ ）开头。

trans-unit.source: Specify an alternative .netrc file to the one in your home directory if the NETRC level is OPTIONAL or REQUIRED. If this option is not specified, the value of the CMAKE_NETRC_FILE variable will be used instead (see file(DOWNLOAD))
trans-unit.target: 如果 NETRC 级别是 OPTIONAL 或 REQUIRED ，请为您的主目录中的 .netrc 文件指定一个替代文件。如果未指定此选项，则将 CMAKE_NETRC_FILE 变量的值（请参见 file(DOWNLOAD) ）

trans-unit.source: Specify an alternative VCTargetsPath value for Visual Studio project files. This allows use of VS platform extension configuration files (.props and .targets) that are not installed with VS.
trans-unit.target: 为Visual Studio项目文件指定替代的 VCTargetsPath 值。这允许使用未随VS安装的VS平台扩展配置文件（ .props 和 .targets ）。

trans-unit.source: Specify an alternative cmake executable for the configure step (use an absolute path). This is generally not recommended, since it is usually desirable to use the same CMake version throughout the whole build. This option is ignored if a custom configure command has been specified with CONFIGURE_COMMAND.
trans-unit.target: 为配置步骤指定替代的cmake可执行文件（使用绝对路径）。通常不建议这样做，因为通常希望在整个构建过程中使用相同的CMake版本。如果已使用 CONFIGURE_COMMAND 指定了自定义配置命令，则忽略此选项。

trans-unit.source: Specify an explicit list of specific files to be submitted. Each individual file must exist at the time of the call.
trans-unit.target: 指定要提交的特定文件的明确列表。在调用时,每个文件必须存在。

trans-unit.source: Specify an identification for the deferred call. The <id> may not be empty and may not begin with a capital letter A-Z. The <id> may begin with an underscore (_) only if it was generated automatically by an earlier call that used ID_VAR to get the id.
trans-unit.target: 指定延迟呼叫的标识。在 <id> 不能为空，不能以大写字母开头 A-Z 。仅当 <id> 由使用 ID_VAR 获取ID的早期调用自动生成时，才可以以下划线（ _ ）开头。

trans-unit.source: Specify an installation component name with which the install rule is associated, such as “runtime” or “development”. During component-specific installation only install rules associated with the given component name will be executed. During a full installation all components are installed unless marked with EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL. If COMPONENT is not provided a default component “Unspecified” is created. The default component name may be controlled with the CMAKE_INSTALL_DEFAULT_COMPONENT_NAME variable.
trans-unit.target: 指定与安装规则相关联的安装组件名称，例如“运行时”或“开发”。在特定于组件的安装过程中，将仅执行与给定组件名称关联的安装规则。在完整安装期间，除非标记为 EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL ,否则将安装所有组件。如果未提供 COMPONENT ,则会创建默认组件“未指定”。可以使用 CMAKE_INSTALL_DEFAULT_COMPONENT_NAME 变量来控制默认组件名称。

trans-unit.source: Specify an output directory name where the generated source file will be placed (swig -o option). If not specified, the SWIG_OUTFILE_DIR variable will be used. If neither is specified, OUTPUT_DIR or CMAKE_SWIG_OUTDIR is used instead.
trans-unit.target: 指定将放置生成的源文件的输出目录名称（swig -o选项）。如果未指定，将使用 SWIG_OUTFILE_DIR 变量。如果两者均未指定，则改用 OUTPUT_DIR 或 CMAKE_SWIG_OUTDIR 。

trans-unit.source: Specify an output directory name where the generated source file will be placed (swig -o option). If not specified, the SWIG_OUTFILE_DIR variable will be used. If neither is specified, OUTPUT_DIR or CMAKE_SWIG_OUTDIR is used instead.
trans-unit.target: 指定将放置生成的源文件的输出目录名称（swig -o 选项）。如果未指定，将使用 SWIG_OUTFILE_DIR 变量。如果未指定，则使用 OUTPUT_DIR 或 CMAKE_SWIG_OUTDIR 。

trans-unit.source: Specify an output directory name where the generated source file will be placed. If not specified, CMAKE_SWIG_OUTDIR is used.
trans-unit.target: 指定将放置生成的源文件的输出目录名称。如果未指定，则使用 CMAKE_SWIG_OUTDIR 。

trans-unit.source: Specify an output directory where the generated source file will be placed (swig -o option) for the considered source file. If not specified, OUTPUT_DIR source property will be used. If neither are specified, the other ways to define output file directory applies (see OUTFILE_DIR option of swig_add_library() command).
trans-unit.target: 指定输出目录，在该目录中将放置所考虑的源文件的生成的源文件（swig -o 选项）。如果未指定，将使用 OUTPUT_DIR 源属性。如果未指定，则使用定义输出文件目录的其他方法（请参见 swig_add_library() 命令的 OUTFILE_DIR 选项）。

trans-unit.source: Specify command line arguments that should be added to the Arguments section of the generated Xcode scheme.

trans-unit.target: 指定要运行程序的目录。

trans-unit.source: Specify environment variables that should be added to the Arguments section of the generated Xcode scheme.
trans-unit.target: 指定环境变量,这些变量应该被添加到生成的Xcode方案的Arguments部分。

trans-unit.source: Specify environment variables that should be defined for running a test.
trans-unit.target: 指定运行测试时应定义的环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Specify extra dependencies for the generated module for <name>.
trans-unit.target: 为 <name> 指定生成模块的额外依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Specify files as a semicolon-separated list of paths. Relative paths are interpreted as relative to the current source directory.
trans-unit.target: 用分号分隔的路径列表来指定文件。相对路径被解释为相对于当前的源目录。

trans-unit.source: Specify files on which the command depends. Each argument is converted to a dependency as follows:
trans-unit.target: 指定命令所依赖的文件。每个参数都会被转换为依赖关系,如下所示。

trans-unit.source: Specify files on which the command depends. If any dependency is an OUTPUT of another custom command in the same directory (CMakeLists.txt file) CMake automatically brings the other custom command into the target in which this command is built. If DEPENDS is not specified the command will run whenever the OUTPUT is missing; if the command does not actually create the OUTPUT then the rule will always run. If DEPENDS specifies any target (created by the add_custom_target(), add_executable(), or add_library() command) a target-level dependency is created to make sure the target is built before any target using this custom command. Additionally, if the target is an executable or library a file-level dependency is created to cause the custom command to re-run whenever the target is recompiled.
trans-unit.target: 指定命令所依赖的文件。如果有任何依赖关系是同一目录（ CMakeLists.txt 文件）中另一个自定义命令的 OUTPUT ，则CMake会自动将另一个自定义命令带入构建此命令的目标中。如果未指定 DEPENDS ,则每当缺少 OUTPUT 时，命令就会运行；如果该命令实际上未创建 OUTPUT ,则该规则将始终运行。如果 DEPENDS 指定任何目标（由 add_custom_target() ， add_executable() 或 add_library() 创建)命令），将创建目标级别的依存关系，以确保使用此自定义命令在任何目标之前先构建目标。此外，如果目标是可执行文件或库，则将创建文件级依赖关系，以使自定义命令在重新编译目标时重新运行。

trans-unit.source: Specify flags of the form -DVAR:TYPE=VALUE to be passed to the cmake command-line used to drive the test build. The above example shows how values for variables INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES, LINK_DIRECTORIES, and LINK_LIBRARIES are used.
trans-unit.target: 指定形式为 -DVAR:TYPE=VALUE 的标志，以将其传递到用于驱动测试构建的 cmake 命令行。上面的示例显示了如何使用变量 INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES ， LINK_DIRECTORIES 和 LINK_LIBRARIES 的值。

trans-unit.source: Specify flags of the form -DVAR:TYPE=VALUE to be passed to the cmake command-line used to drive the test build. The example in try_compile() shows how values for variables INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES, LINK_DIRECTORIES, and LINK_LIBRARIES are used.
trans-unit.target: 指定形式为 -DVAR:TYPE=VALUE 的标志，以将其传递到用于驱动测试构建的 cmake 命令行。 try_compile() 中的示例说明如何使用变量 INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES ， LINK_DIRECTORIES 和 LINK_LIBRARIES 的值。

trans-unit.source: Specify flags to be added to the bison command line.
trans-unit.target: 指定要添加到 bison 命令行的标志。

trans-unit.source: Specify how components are grouped for multi-package component-aware CPack generators.
trans-unit.target: 为多包组件感知CPack生成器指定组件的分组方式。

trans-unit.source: Specify how long (in seconds) to wait after a timed-out submission before attempting to re-submit.
trans-unit.target: 指定在超时提交后等待多长时间(以秒为单位)再尝试重新提交。

trans-unit.source: Specify how many times to retry a timed-out submission.
trans-unit.target: 指定重试超时提交的次数。

trans-unit.source: Specify labels for the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 指定当前目录的标签。

trans-unit.source: Specify languages whose compilers to check. Languages C, CXX, and Fortran are supported.
trans-unit.target: 指定要检查其编译器的语言。支持语言 C ， CXX 和 Fortran 。

trans-unit.source: Specify libraries or flags to use when linking a given target and/or its dependents. Usage requirements from linked library targets will be propagated. Usage requirements of a target’s dependencies affect compilation of its own sources.
trans-unit.target: 指定链接给定目标和/或其依赖项时要使用的库或标志。来自链接库目标的使用要求将被传播。目标依赖项的使用要求会影响其自身源代码的编译。

trans-unit.source: Specify libraries or flags to use when linking any targets created later in the current directory or below by commands such as add_executable() or add_library(). See the target_link_libraries() command for meaning of arguments.
trans-unit.target: 指定当通过诸如 add_executable() 或 add_library() 之类的命令链接在当前目录或更低版本中稍后创建的任何目标时要使用的库或标志。有关参数的含义，请参见 target_link_libraries() 命令。

trans-unit.source: Specify libraries to be linked in the generated project. The list of libraries may refer to system libraries and to Imported Targets from the calling project.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在生成的项目中链接的库。库列表可以引用系统库以及从调用项目中导入的目标。

trans-unit.source: Specify link step options to pass to target_link_options() in the generated project.

trans-unit.source: Specify link step options to pass to target_link_options() or to set the STATIC_LIBRARY_OPTIONS target property in the generated project, depending on the CMAKE_TRY_COMPILE_TARGET_TYPE variable.

trans-unit.source: Specify one or more of the following components as you call this find module. See example below.

trans-unit.source: Specify one or more possible names for the file in a directory.
trans-unit.target: 为目录中的文件指定一个或多个可能的名称。

trans-unit.source: Specify one or more possible names for the full path to a file.
trans-unit.target: 为文件的完整路径指定一个或多个可能的名称。

trans-unit.target: 为库指定一个或多个可能的名称。

trans-unit.source: Specify options to be passed to gcov. The gcov command is run as gcov <options>... -o <gcov-dir> <file>.gcda. If not specified, the default option is just -b -x.
trans-unit.target: 指定要传递给gcov的选项。所述 gcov 命令运行作为 gcov <options>... -o <gcov-dir> <file>.gcda 。如果未指定，则默认选项为 -b -x 。

trans-unit.source: Specify other targets on which the external project depends. The other targets will be brought up to date before any of the external project’s steps are executed. Because the external project uses additional custom targets internally for each step, the DEPENDS option is the most convenient way to ensure all of those steps depend on the other targets. Simply doing add_dependencies(<name> <targets>) will not make any of the steps dependent on <targets>.
trans-unit.target: 指定外部项目所依赖的其他目标。在执行外部项目的任何步骤之前，将更新其他目标。由于外部项目在每个步骤的内部都使用其他自定义目标，因此 DEPENDS 选项是确保所有这些步骤都依赖于其他目标的最便捷方法。简单地执行 add_dependencies(<name> <targets>) 不会使任何步骤依赖于 <targets> 。

trans-unit.source: Specify output directory for Fortran modules provided by the target.

trans-unit.source: Specify permissions for installed files. Valid permissions are OWNER_READ, OWNER_WRITE, OWNER_EXECUTE, GROUP_READ, GROUP_WRITE, GROUP_EXECUTE, WORLD_READ, WORLD_WRITE, WORLD_EXECUTE, SETUID, and SETGID. Permissions that do not make sense on certain platforms are ignored on those platforms.
trans-unit.target: 指定安装文件的权限。有效权限是 OWNER_READ ， OWNER_WRITE ， OWNER_EXECUTE ， GROUP_READ ， GROUP_WRITE ， GROUP_EXECUTE ， WORLD_READ ， WORLD_WRITE ， WORLD_EXECUTE ， SETUID 和 SETGID 。在某些平台上没有意义的权限将在那些平台上被忽略。

trans-unit.target: 在 ctest(1) 仪表板客户端脚本中指定CTest ResourceSpecFile 设置。

trans-unit.target: 在 ctest(1) 仪表板客户端脚本中指定CTest SVNUpdateOptions 设置。

trans-unit.source: Specify the CTest Site setting in a ctest(1) dashboard client script.
trans-unit.target: 在 ctest(1) 仪表板客户端脚本中指定“ CTest Site 设置。

trans-unit.target: 在 ctest(1) 仪表板客户端脚本中指定CTest SubmitURL 设置。

trans-unit.target: 在 ctest(1) 仪表板客户端脚本中指定CTest TimeOut 设置。
